notes.title: Availability of data and materials
notes.p: All figures and tables generated in this study are available in this article and its additional files. The sequences used in this study are available in GenBank or GISAID or can be requested from the corresponding author of related publications â€“ the GenBank/GISAID accession number or reference for the sequences can be found in Table S4 (Additional file 8). The figures and tables, in addition to the processing and analysis scripts, are also available in DR-NTU (Data) repository 10.21979/N9/ILQBAB.
